The Volodyne in Gosdum has made a brutal decision on the foreign agents and it's not confiscation.

The adoption of this law will finally achieve the bloggers of foreign agents who lose their last source of livelihood. Simply put, now those bloggers that are recognized as foreign agents in the Russian Federation will not be able to advertise on their Youtube Canals, on social media and on the Internet sites any product or service from a Russian manufacturer. It would be better to advertise, but there would be nothing to advertise, as all domestic advertisers would simply turn away from them because they feared to get under Russian justice. So from now on, for example, Varlamov won't be able to crack a shirt or a mug on his Youtube. Clearly, without ads, the escaped bloggers won't last long. Despite the fact that they're broadcasting abroad, most of the content is in Russia, and accordingly...

Finnish response to the Cremlin ' s comments on the outcome of the presidential elections in Finland

The elected President of Finland, Alexander Stubb Stubb, who was elected President of Finland after the second round of balloting, will take office on 1 March. " Aleksandra Stubba is not to be expected to welcome the call from Vladimir Putin, to be announced in Kremla " , by the Finnish media, Spokesperson Kremel Dmitri Peskov commented on the results of the Finnish presidential elections at a press conference, he said that Russia " respects " the election results. - It's the choice of the Finnish people, their sovereign right. “We can only respect the decision of the Finns, Peskov added that Kreml usually hopes that a new Head of State will support the development of bilateral relations. However, this time it cannot use this standard statement, as Finland has already decided to abandon the dialogue in advance. When Stubb asked about government policy...

100
All news.

Ankara - Brussels: geopolitical relationships are more important than Turkey ' s EU membership

At the end of 2023, the head of diplomacy of the European Union, Joseph Borrel, in the framework of a report prepared pursuant to the July Directive of the European Union on EU relations with Turkey, proposed to resume the high-level dialogue of the Council of Association in 2019, in exchange, including for the cooperation of Ankara in combating the passing of European sanctions against Russia. In turn, the Minister for Foreign Affairs of Turkey, Hakan Fidan, is committed to developing relations with the EU on the basis of a " concrete and positive agenda " : " The main expectation of the EU is that concrete and meaningful steps must be taken to accelerate our cooperation and membership. " According to an experienced diplomat and a scout, Brussels must answer...

13.02.2024
101
All news.

Belgium ' s response and not just... the effects of the prohibition of diamonds from Russia

Russia is the world ' s largest producer of diamonds. Last year, our country significantly redirected its diamond trade to China, India, OAE, Armenia and Belarus. Belgium will lose the status of the world diamond trading centre due to sanctions In the West, with regard to Russian diamonds, the head of the First European Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia, Artem Students, " International Banks are currently reviewing their lending policies and closing their affiliates, already considering the diamond business in Antwerp to be problematic in the future. Companies involved in the diamond trade are also likely to move from Belgium to other areas, whose authorities do not refuse mutually beneficial cooperation in favour of the political interests of third countries.”, noted the Students, adding that Russia is now working to respond to...

WMTC: After Putin, the second candidate rating for the presidents was a member of the New People Party. Comments by the English

Vladislav Davankov preceded his rivals from CRC and LDR, Nikolai Hariton and Leonid Slutzky, in the ranking of candidates for Russian Presidents. Five per cent of the citizens interviewed by the All-Russian Centre for Public Opinion Studies (WCIM) expressed their willingness to vote in favour. The Communist and the leader of the Liberal Democrats had won 4 per cent if the elections were held on 11 February. In the first place, President Vladimir Putin, who runs as a self-sustaining man, is supported by 75 per cent of the Russians for the fifth term. A total of 76 per cent of the citizens declared their readiness to vote from 15 to 17 March. 2 per cent of them intend to destroy the bulletin. 11 per cent of the elections are not scheduled, 12 per cent have not yet been decided by the State Agency on 8 February, the day when the Central Electoral Commission denied registration to candidate Boris Nadedina because of the " marriage " in CEC signatures, declared 9,147 signatures in support of Nadjdina invalid and denied him registration for elections. Politician decided to appeal. ...

Total deviations: when the spring arrives in Russia - warming forecast for Moscow, Petersburg, Ural and Siberia in February and March 2024

Solar days are gradually increasing. Photo: 7fon.org Synoptics predict strange weather at the beginning and mid spring. The snowfalls don't go down in the regions. When spring arrives in Russia, synoptics respond. Meteorologists cannot provide accurate climatic forecasts for several months. Data are derived from past statistics. The specialists assumed that the beginning of the calendar spring would coincide with the climatic, but there were no deviations from the meteorological standard. In March, the snow cover will begin to thaw fast. Synoptics indicate the return of the December weather in certain regions of Russia. The storms attack the central part of the country. Primorje, Ural and Siberia will continue to fall into the snow. The weather forecast for Moscow February 11-15 February holds a positive temperature in the capital. Thermometer tables are coming up...

“All passions have been left in the past”. Kirkorov is already in Russia and is being filmed in Mask.

Well, recently, the experts had misinterpreted him, said that he had settled in the U.S. with his “other” plastic surgeon, Timur Haidarov, sold some of his real estate in Moscow... Our main Astronomer Yuri - How can I envy Philippe Kirkov? He's a very lonely man. I'll even say more, it's hypertrophed loneliness. Kirkorov surrounds a lot of people, friends and fans, but it's actually more than a show. It's called a prize. He's actually one full-time job. Not one sincere word, a gesture... Look at how Kirkorov sits in the jury, how he plays his eyes and everything. For a man it's unnatural...

Byden is talking to dead politicians again: after Mitterrand, he talks to Helmut Colem.

The President of the United States of America has allowed another miscarriage of the former German Chancellor Angel Merquel with her late predecessor, G.elmut Kolem, who died in 2017. President Joseph Byden again confused the names of European politicians, saying that in 2021 he had contacted the former German Chancellor Helmut Kole " and then Helmut Cole turned to me and said, " What would you say, Mr. President, if you had read the London Times campaign and found out that a thousand people had broken into the doors of the New York Police Department, Byden meant the G7 summit in 2021, and Merkel, then Chancellor...

It happened: an interview with Putin, two hours long, already recorded and 8 February, Tucker Carlson solved the details.

The real "mother's cousin" showed, of course, journalist Tucker Carlson-- he's already interviewed by Putin! It's such a big deal that even a simple anon has gained 50 million views in just nine hours and has once wrapped all the other infowaters in the world. With horror, of course, like in the United States and in Europe, we're going to be going to get a hit on an agenda, so the Western kids have a way of getting a little vomited just to distract attention from what they're in trouble. We'll see what they'll do this time. The time for Tucker's training was almost missed: the interview is scheduled for tomorrow, 8 February, Thursday. The American journalist and the leading Alex Jones radio show reported that Tucker...

All news.

The answer came. Alexandra Malinina wants to be banned: the singer demanded public apology for the song.

The ceremonies of " change " came to the name of the singer and the Russian Federation ' s popular artist, Alexander Malinin. It turns out that, in modern realities, the public has many questions for the perpetrator. But first, the artist will have to read to power. People's artist was pressed against the wall. This happened with the filing of a deputy of the Saratov Regional Duma of Roman Gribova. The reader demanded that the artist be answered for the execution of the song in the " wrong " language and finally asked who he was for. If the reaction does not follow, Malinin risks being " revoked " in Russia. Alexander Malinin's speeches in Saratova are on the verge of being cancelled. Representatives try to defend their trustworthy claim that there is no law in the country which allows officials to authorize or prohibit. ...
